news.title: Chandigarh: SC puts freehold conversion ball in home ministry's court
news.para: The UT administration has discussed the issue with the ministry earlier and shared almost all the required documents already.

news.title: Illegal colonies to become thing of past: Punjab housing minister
news.para: ​He directed the Greater Ludhiana Area Development Authority (GLADA) to unleash development works under its jurisdiction on war footing and asked the officials to ensure that residents of all approved colonies get all the amenities.

news.title: Property tax rebate ends in Chandigarh, fines start
news.para: If the defaulters failed to deposit the tax amount, strict actions would be taken against them as per the norms, including the sealing of their buildings.

news.title: Nagpur development body allots 49 quota flats under PMAY to general category
news.para: There were 49 flats meant for poor people from various reservation categories but those were allotted to applicants of general category while 10 tenements were placed in categories other than they were meant for.

news.title: Builders misusing foothill policies to erect buildings in Dehradun: Experts
news.para: After the twin tower demolition in Noida earlier this week, several activists and architects pointed out that Dehradun is also witnessing a growth in high-rise projects built on active seismic zones as the builders are misusing foothill policies, said experts.

news.title: Applications under land pooling policy can be submitted till Sep 30: DDA
news.para: It is based on a public-private partnership towards proactively increasing economic opportunities and housing supply in a time-bound manner, and harnessing private potential through pooling of land parcels, the statement said.

news.title: DHFL bank fraud: Court grants interim bail to businessman in Rs 34,615 crore scam
news.para: The application seeking bail disclosed medical grounds for release which were corroborated by the report from the Medical Officer In-charge of the jail dispensary, the judge noted.

news.title: Punjab National Bank hikes MCLR by 0.05% across tenors from September 1
news.para: ​The benchmark one-year tenor MCLR, which is used to price most consumer loans such as car, auto and personal, will be at 7.70 per cent against the existing 7.65 per cent, PNB said in a regulatory filing on Wednesday.

news.title: Gurugram: Submit building plans by Friday for audit, developers told
news.para: The developers of 17 residential societies facing construction-related issues have been asked to submit structural and architectural designs to the district town planner (enforcement) by Friday.

news.title: Noida: Nine group housing plots up for grabs in sectors 146, 151
news.para: Six plots ranging 18,000- 20,000 sqm are available in Sector 151 while three plots in Sector 146 range from 7,800-94,000 sqm. The e-brochure of the scheme will be available from September 5. The last date for application is September 26.

news.title: NCDRC penalises Raheja developer for delay in Revanta project in Gurugram
news.para: “The opposite party (Raheja developers) is directed to refund the entire amount deposited by the respective complainants along with delay compensation at 9% per annum on the deposited amount from the respective dates of deposits till realization, within a period of two months of this order. Any delay beyond two months, will attract an interest rate of 12% per annum for the same period,” NCDRC said in the order.

news.title: Delhi RERA registers 18 projects of DDA
news.para: In December 2021, the RERA had issued an order asking the DDA to get the projects registered to protect the interests of homebuyers but the DDA filed an appeal in the case.

news.title: Assam Land and Revenue Regulation to be amended to counter unabated encroachment
news.para: The cabinet meeting decided to have Chintan Shivir to be held on 24-26 September 2022 under chairmanship of CM and to be participated by Cabinet Ministers, senior-most Secretaries of around 57 departments. It will deliberate on various pending issues and chalk out a future plan for tackling the issues

news.title: Eye on expansion, Hidco set to survey 20,000 acres around New Town, Rajarhat
news.para: The land survey will cover a total of 30 mouzas under different gram panchayats like Jyangra Hatiara, Patharghata, Mahisbathan II, Rajarhat Bishnupur and the erstwhile Rajarhat Gopalpur municipality that now falls under Bidhannagar Municipal Corporation.

news.title: District administration, Indore development body explore new avenues to raise revenue
news.para: Collector Manish Singh and IDA CEO Ramprakash Ahirwar on Monday reviewed the land pooling process for TPS-1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 7, 8, 9 and TPS-10 proposed in Indore.
